definition: and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: Thekey process improving fibre straightness is drawing process in carding system, however, in combing system, is combing process.
